title: Ex PM wishes New PM
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has wished the newly-appointed Prime Minister, Ranil Wickremesinghe.
In a tweet, he has stated that he wishes the new Prime Minister all the best as he navigates troubled times.
Sri Lanka : Ranil Wickremesinghe appointed Prime Minister by President Gotabaya
